page.title: 16LOCAL NEWS IN EASTLEIGH P1
page.content:
{EASTLEIGH WEEKLY NEWS Thursday July 4th 1985 Price 14p
{HEADLINE}A new link road from Chickenhall lane to Wide lane that would by pass Eastleigh could only be built if industries are persuaded into the area {JOBS REQUIRED:_ Two morning cleaners to earn Â£1.60p per hour. CONTACT W.G. BUSH Funeral Directors of 73 LEIGH ROAD EASTLEIGH
{MARATHON RUN Veteran church organist Mr Nicholls is taking part in a marathon organ playing compertition on tuesday 8th july 1985 at the age of 78.
